amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to expand a reporting requirement on repression by the Chinese government in Xinjiang province by requiring additional information on the contributions of external technologies and financial support to the Xinjiang authorities repression.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
